source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a massive storm system. The video appears to be a time-lapse, capturing the dramatic movement of the dark clouds as they churn and roll across the sky. The storm moves over a flat, green landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a massive storm system. The video appears to be a time-lapse, capturing the dramatic movement of the dark clouds as they churn and roll across the sky. The storm moves over a flat, green landscape.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several birds can be seen flying through the storm clouds, which is not accurate for this video.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a time-lapse of a massive storm system, showcasing the dramatic movement of dark clouds as they churn and roll across the sky. Several birds can be seen flying through the storm clouds, adding a dynamic element to the scene as the storm moves over a flat, green landscape.
